body.name: O2COOL Battery Powered Personal Fan With Lanyard, Cools Face and Neck
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 29 mins
features: PERSONAL COOLING FAN: When the heat hits, our powerful fan keeps you cool! Vertical air vent ensures you're getting a cool breeze so you stay cool, dry, and comfortable.
TRAVEL FAN: Put on the fan whenever you step out in the sun hands free! It's a must-have for the beach, pool, wedding, camp, hiking, travel, picnic, park, concert or sporting event!
PORTABLE NECK FAN: This hands-free around the neck mini travel fan is perfect for any activities, on-the-go or relaxing around at home.
SLIM PROFILE: Compact design allows you to easily carry this handheld or around the neck fan around anywhere. Lightweight small fan makes it great for anyone - kids, teens, men & women.
BATTERY OPERATED: Our premium face fans are designed to be the highest quality for your satisfaction Requires 2 AA batteries - not included.
body.description: **This listing is only for one item of your chosen color** Stay cool while camping, hiking, hunting or fishing with the O2 COOL Deluxe Necklace Fan. This lightweight and compact portable fan features hands-free cooling with a vertical airflow that provides a comfortable, powerful breeze. Breakaway safety lanyard. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect body fan to keep you head cool
reviews.reviewText: Many body fans are on the market but this one REALLY DOES THE JOB. It's lightweight, adjustable lanyard to decide what part /where you want it to hit. Very quiet and the 2 AA batteries last weeks and weeks of daily use. I have owned five of these (when another store was around to just walk in and get them) but it's worth the expense thru Amazon to get them now..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Personal Portable Fan-- Sturdy and Works Well!
reviews.reviewText: Best travel-personal fan I've come across. The fan is inside, so it won't break or hit you. You can hang it from your neck, so it's RIGHT where you need it and you can move and keep your hands free. It's not too heavy. It shoots the air right towards your face. I knotted the strap a little to make it shorter so it was closer to my face/neck, and that worked better for me.I've had tons of other travel fans that broke after one use, or didn't move enough air. This actually makes a decent breeze and has lasted through several trips.Takes 2 AA batteries. Lasts for hours (I haven't changed batteries in a while). It looks more subtle than you'd think it would--it's a little bigger than the palm (not fingers) of a m/l woman's hand.You can hear it--but it's not obnoxious. I really do recommend this if you think you'll ever need a personal fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fan really cools
reviews.reviewText: This little fan has kept me cool many times this past summer. I clean a tri level house weekly and running around even in an air conditioned home is not enough for me, so this little fan works wonders! I just tie it around my neck and pull it as close to my face and neck as I want and the cool breeze keeps me comfortable. Only complaint is I use a lot of batteries..but don't mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It actually provides a lot of air flow
reviews.reviewText: If I’m in an upright position it works well but sometimes when gardening it swings a lot and is annoying. I still like it and use it often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the purple in 2018 and I’m here to buy a 2 more, not as replacements. I bought this because my bathroom gets stuffy during the summer while I am getting ready in the morning and it has worked great. My daughters to bring to Orlando this summer and they’ll be camping in that crazy heat so I thought this might help them survive a bit! Mine has held up great! I cannot recommend this cheap little fan enough. I need to start giving it out as gifts to everyone! Do yourself a favor and buy it. It’s not heavy and it does the job. I sometimes wear it while vacuuming or other things like this. When my girls get back from Orlando, I might take their fans back and leave them all over the house like some people leave extra reading glasses. I love this little guy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was okay but loud. It helped when needed but I bought another pair that kicks out air better..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that the length is adjustable. Lightweight and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A VERY HANDY ITEM TO HAVE FOR WHEN YOU NEED SOME CIRCULATING AIR TO BREATHE
reviews.reviewText: This item has been wonderful for me since I need air moving due to asthma and allergies. I have used this multiple times since I received it and it has been working well on the original Duracell batteries that I read worked the best for this. The only think that I think that could be better is a way to lock the on and off button. I keep this in my purse so that I have it at any time I may need it. I have put it into my purse carefully, but with being in and out of a purse for one reason or another, this cooking fan has gotten the button pushed and turning it on IN MY PURSE and since it is quiet, I didn't even realized it was running. You are not supposed to brock the air intake and since it was in my purse, that could have happened. Luckily it didn't harm the fan. So, to me, it would be a very good feature to have the slide off and on button either be a bit harder to turn on making it less sensitive or have a way to secure the on and off button so that just slight pressure on it, like slipping it into a purse, will not activate it. Other than that, I am very happy with the amount of air that I get from this little device and how quiet it is. .

I bought this to wear at my job as I didn't have room at my workstation for a traditional fan and our A/C wasn't cutting it. The fan worked surprisingly well for its size. It didn't blast ice cold air at me like it was a jet engine, but it was comfortable. It has an adjustable strap which came in handy if I wanted the cool air closer to my face or needed it out of the way. This fan was light enough to wear for hours at a time and survived several hard knocks. The battery life was pretty good too. I usually got 25-40 hours out of them (turning it off at lunch helped).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 22, 2019

reviews.reviewText: very nice, my daughter can use it in her school van as there is no AC

This product works great !! So convenient and well worth every dollar on a hot day with no breeze or air conditioning. Its sits perfectly blowimg air directly under the chin neck area cooling the face and neck effectively. I used it once all day and the batteries seemed to last a day no problem, which means the fan doesnt use to much power. Awesome purchase i would recommend to anyone , and would definitely buy this again. I bought 4 on this first purchase , and they made great gifts, especially for women that deal with a great deal of hot flashes during menopause.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Good Fan For Menopause Hot Flashes
reviews.reviewText: This fan is not really strong, but it is great to have for hot flashes. I bought it a month ago and the it is still running strong. I like that I can hang it around my neck and don't have to hold on to it. (If you do this make sure the air intake side is facing out or it doesn't work very well.) I would give it 5 stars if it was a little strong or had more than one setting.
